Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.PatientScaleButton Class Reference

Controls the scaling functionality for the patient's model in the hand menu. More...

Inheritance diagram for Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.PatientScaleButton:

Public Attributes

float scaleFactor
 The scale factor the model is scaled.
 

Private Member Functions

void OnTriggerEnter (Collider other)
 Called when a collider enters the trigger zone and disables the button of the users hand menu to prevent bounce effects.
 
void OnTriggerExit (Collider other)
 Called when a collider exits the trigger zone, the button is enabled and calles the method to scale the patients model, then calls the coroutine to enable the button again.
 
IEnumerator EnableAfterSeconds ()
 Enables the button after a specified delay of the users hand menu to mitigate button bounce effects.
 
void executeAction ()
 Scales the patient's segmented model using the specified scaling factor.
 

Private Attributes

bool buttonPressDisabled = false
 Variable stores if the button is currently disabled.
 
float disableTime = 0.1f
 Time the button is disabled after press to mitigate the bounce effect.
 

Detailed Description

Controls the scaling functionality for the patient's model in the hand menu.
